name: create unit
description: create a new unit

name: view unit
description: list units or view details of a unit

name: edit unit
description: edit metadata of a unit

name: delete unit
description: delete a unit and all its associated data

name: create collection
description: create a new collection under a unit

name: view collection
description: list/query collections or view details of a collection

name: edit collection
description: edit metadata of a collection

name: activate collection
description: activate/deactivate a collection and its associated data

name: delete collection
description: delete a collection and all its associated data

name: create item
description: create an item under a collection

name: view item
description: list/query items or view details of an item

name: edit item
description: edit metadata of an item

name: delete item
description: delete an item and all its associated data

name: add content file
description: add a new primaryfile to an item

name: view content file
description: list/query primaryfiles or view details of a primaryfile

name: play  content file
description: play the media file of a primaryfile

name: edit content file
description: edit metadata of a primaryfile

name: delete  content file
description: delete a primaryfile and all its associated data

name: add supplement
description: add a new supplement to a unit/collection/item/primaryfile

name: view supplement
description: list/query supplements or view details of a supplement

name: edit supplement
description: edit metadata of a supplement

name: move supplement
description: move a unit/collection/item/primaryfile supplement to another parent

name: delete  supplement
description: delete a supplement and all its associated data

name: run unrestricted workflow
description: run unrestricted workflow on selected files

name: run restricted workflow
description: run restricted workflow on selected files

name: view workflow result
description: list/query workflow results or view a workflow result output file

name: export workflow result
description: export selected workflow results to a CSV file

name: edit workflow result
description: edit workflow result output name/alias and/or final status

name: delete workflow result
description: delete a workflow result from dashboard and Galaxy

name: create workflow
description: create a new workflow

name: view workflow
description: list/query workflows or view details of a workflow

name: edit workflow
description: edit metadata and/or structure of a workflow

name: restrict workflow
description: set/unset access restrictions on a workflow

name: delete workflow
description: delete a workflow and all its associated data

name: ingest batch
description: run batch ingest process to create content data

name: retrieve bag
description: retrieve bag contents at various levels

name: deliver bag
description: deliver bag contents to Avalon at various levels

name: run evaluation
description: run MGM evaluation tests

name: view evaluation
description: list/view/visualize MGM evaluation tools/tests/results

name: approve user
description: approve/reject user account registration

name: view permission
description: list/view permission settings

name: config global permission
description: config permission settings on actions for global roles

name: config unit permission
description: config permission settings on actions for unit-scope roles

name: view role assignment
description: view user role assignments within a unit

name: assign staff role
description: assign staff roles other than unit/collection manager to users within a unit

name: assign collection manager
description: assign collection manager role to users within a unit

name: assign unit manager
description: assign unit manager role to users within a unit
